mapper.select: SELECT distinct CONCAT(sysEntity.code,':',sysDictionary.`value`) FROM sys_permission as record LEFT JOIN sys_entity as sysEntity on sysEntity.id = record.entity_id LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary as sysDictionary on sysDictionary.code = record.type_dcode LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission as srf on srf.permission_id = record.id LEFT JOIN sys_account as sysAccount on FIND_IN_SET(srf.role_id,sysAccount.role_id) WHERE sysAccount.id = #{userId} and srf.scope_dcode != 'permission_scope_none'

SELECT CONCAT(sysEntity.code,':',sysDictionary.`value`) FROM sys_permission as record LEFT JOIN sys_entity as sysEntity on sysEntity.id = record.entity_id LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary as sysDictionary on sysDictionary.code = record.type_dcode WHERE record.id = #{id}
SELECT record.* FROM sys_permission as record where record.entity_id = #{entityId} ORDER BY record.type_dcode
